actor_awards.notes: A respected character actor known for his intensity and method acting background. He won the National Board of Review Award for Best Supporting Actor for his roles in 'The Brothers Karamazov' and 'The Bravados'. He also won a Western Heritage Award for a guest role on 'Gunsmoke'. He famously turned down the role of Bo Decker in the film version of 'Bus Stop', a role he originated on Broadway.

filmography.title: The Brothers Karamazov
filmography.role_description: The illegitimate, epileptic son and servant of Fyodor Karamazov, whose resentment and manipulation lead to tragedy.
filmography.plot: The four sons of a lecherous and domineering father react to his murder in 19th-century Russia.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: The Bravados
filmography.role_description: One of the four escaped convicts hunted by a vengeful rancher who believes they killed his wife.
filmography.plot: A rancher hunts down the four outlaws who he believes raped and murdered his wife, only to discover a disturbing truth.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: The Unforgiven
filmography.role_description: A young man who courts the protagonist's sister but becomes a victim of the racial tensions surrounding her heritage.
filmography.plot: A frontier family's secrets are revealed when it is discovered that their adopted daughter is of Native American birth, sparking conflict with the local tribe and neighbors.

filmography.title: Wild River
filmography.role_description: A local cotton farmer and bully who antagonizes the TVA agent sent to clear the land for a dam.
filmography.plot: A TVA bureaucrat comes to rural Tennessee to oversee the construction of a dam and must evict an elderly woman who refuses to leave her island home.

filmography.title: The Outrage
filmography.role_description: The lawman investigating a crime with conflicting witness accounts in this Western retelling of Rashomon.
filmography.plot: A disillusioned preacher, a prospector, and a con man listen to the conflicting testimonies of a bandit, a wife, and a husband regarding a violent crime.

filmography.title: Hour of the Gun
filmography.role_description: The prosecuting attorney in the trial following the Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.
filmography.plot: Wyatt Earp and Doc Holliday seek legal and extra-legal revenge against the Clanton gang after the famous gunfight in Tombstone.

filmography.title: The Ambushers
filmography.role_description: A beer baron and villain who is involved in the theft of a government flying saucer.
filmography.plot: Secret agent Matt Helm travels to Acapulco to recover a stolen experimental flying saucer and deals with a variety of beautiful women and dangerous villains.

filmography.title: Lawman
filmography.role_description: A hot-headed ranch hand whose accidental killing of an old man sets off a chain of violence.
filmography.plot: A tough marshal arrives in a town to arrest a group of cattlemen for the accidental death of an old man, leading to a standoff with the local land baron.

filmography.title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
filmography.role_description: An interrogator who questions the talking apes after they arrive on 20th-century Earth.
filmography.plot: Three intelligent apes from the future travel back in time to 1973 Earth, where they become celebrities before being viewed as a threat.

filmography.title: The Deserter
filmography.role_description: A member of a special forces unit comprised of military convicts sent on a suicide mission.
filmography.plot: A cavalry officer leads a ragtag group of specialists into Mexico to destroy an Apache stronghold.

filmography.title: Something Big
filmography.role_description: An outlaw who makes a deal with the protagonist involving a Gatling gun.
filmography.plot: An aging bandit plans a daring raid on a Mexican treasure trove to accomplish one last big score before his fiancée arrives.

filmography.title: The Take
filmography.role_description: A corrupt police captain involved with a local crime syndicate.
filmography.plot: A San Francisco cop is sent to New Mexico to help break up a crime ring, but finds corruption within the local police force.

filmography.title: Empire of the Ants
filmography.role_description: A local sheriff who becomes a victim of giant mutated ants.
filmography.plot: A con artist tries to sell phony real estate in the Florida Everglades, but the group is attacked by giant radioactive ants.

filmography.title: Viva Knievel!
filmography.role_description: A criminal involved in a plot to smuggle drugs using the famous daredevil's tour.
filmography.plot: Daredevil Evel Knievel is lured into a scheme by drug smugglers who plan to kill him during a stunt in Mexico.

filmography.title: Moonshine County Express
filmography.role_description: A corrupt sheriff who arrests the villain for murder in a twist ending.
filmography.plot: Three daughters of a murdered moonshiner try to sell his stash of whiskey while evading a local kingpin.

filmography.title: Love and Bullets
filmography.role_description: An associate of a mob boss involved in the hunt for a witness.
filmography.plot: A Phoenix cop travels to Switzerland to bring back a mobster's girlfriend who is a key witness, dodging hitmen along the way.

filmography.title: Steel
filmography.role_description: A tough construction worker who joins a crew racing to complete a skyscraper.
filmography.plot: A construction crew battles time, the elements, and sabotage to finish a high-rise building on schedule.

filmography.title: Caddyshack
filmography.role_description: The stern, working-class father of the protagonist Danny Noonan.
filmography.plot: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

filmography.title: Brubaker
filmography.role_description: A corrupt prison official who clashes with the new reformist warden.
filmography.plot: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

filmography.title: Cuba Crossing
filmography.role_description: A plotter involved in a conspiracy to assassinate Fidel Castro.
filmography.plot: An adventurer gets caught up in a plot to kill Fidel Castro in Key West, Florida.

filmography.title: St. Helens
filmography.role_description: A local inn owner who is concerned about the volcanic activity near his business.
filmography.plot: A dramatization of the events leading up to the 1980 eruption of Mount St. Helens, focusing on a stubborn old man who refuses to leave.

filmography.title: Dragonslayer
filmography.role_description: A Christian priest who helps the protagonist and confronts the dragon.
filmography.plot: A young wizard's apprentice is sent to kill a dragon that has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom.

filmography.title: Superstition
filmography.role_description: A police inspector investigating a series of gruesome deaths at a cursed house.
filmography.plot: A witch put to death in 1692 swears vengeance on her persecutors and returns to the present day to kill anyone who enters her former home.

filmography.title: I'm Dancing as Fast as I Can
filmography.role_description: The husband of a cancer patient who is the subject of the protagonist's documentary.
filmography.plot: A successful filmmaker becomes addicted to Valium and her life spirals out of control.

filmography.title: Hard to Hold
filmography.role_description: The father of the female lead, Diana, who disapproves of her relationship with a rock star.
filmography.plot: A rock star falls in love with a children's author after they collide in a car accident.
filmography.awards: Golden Raspberry: Nomination – Worst Supporting Actor

filmography.title: Born American
filmography.role_description: An American official who tries to negotiate the release of three students imprisoned in Russia.
filmography.plot: Three American students on vacation in Finland cross the border into the Soviet Union as a prank and get thrown into a brutal prison.

filmography.title: Breaking In
filmography.role_description: A retired crook and poker buddy of the main character, Ernie.
filmography.plot: An aging safecracker takes on a young apprentice, but their partnership is threatened by the younger man's carelessness.
